details.title: 401: The Way of the Warrior (1)
details.actor: Avery Brooks/Armin Shimerman/Rene Auberjonois/Alexander Siddig/Terry Farrell/Colm Meaney/Nana Visitor/Aron Eisenberg/Andrew Robinson/Max Grodenchik/Michael Dorn/Cirroc Lofton/J. G. Hertzler/Jeffrey Combs/Marc Alaimo/Chase Masterson/Casey Biggs/Nicole deBoer
details.overview: On DVD as 401. The Klingons attack Cardassia in an attempt to overthrow the planet's newly installed civilian government. When the crew of Deep Space Nine saves the members of the new government, they fall under attack from the Klingons as well. Worf is transferred to Deep Space Nine.
